data.title: fix: four bug fixes (bd-17a, bd-2ea, bd-1re, bd-1ex)
data.description: Fix get_current_workspace @ suffix (bd-17a), replace deprecated maw ws jj suggestions (bd-2ea), apply --message to single-workspace merges (bd-1re), always --colocate on jj git init (bd-1ex)

data.reason: Security review: no concerns. All subprocess calls use Command::new().args() (no shell injection). String/doc changes, trim_end_matches fix is consistent with codebase pattern, init colocate is safe behavioral change, single-ws merge describe uses safe arg passing.
